DOC.brief_title: Study To Establish The Effects Of PF-04457845 On Sleep In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 Total body weight > 50 kg History active sleep disorder History sleep circadian rhythm sleep disorder include RLS , narcolepsy , sleep apnea , phase advance delay syndrome within past 5 year Currently plan involve night rotate shift work travel across four time zone 14 day prior screen
